lead.headline: Coastal Summit Agrees On New Green Shipping Corridor
lead.summary: Twelve ports signed a synchronized emissions timetable with shared fuel and customs lanes.

stories.title: Chip Foundry Opens Arctic Cooling Facility
stories.summary: Pilot plant targets 18% lower energy draw for high-density packaging lines.

stories.title: Rail Freight Demand Hits Five-Quarter High
stories.summary: Cross-border contracts rose after insurers reduced storm premiums in key routes.

stories.title: Observatory Detects Rare Aurora Spiral
stories.summary: Researchers linked the shape to simultaneous solar bursts from two active regions.
